website_summaries.verdict: Dragon Age Inquisition isn't perfect -- but pretty close and very easily the best in the series by a wide margin.
pros: Bigger and better than ever, Inquisition expands on the Dragon Age world not only with new story and characters, but with a slew of gameplay upgrades as well
cons: It suffers a little from too many inconsequential side-quests
Some of the gameplay elements are a little hard to get a handle on early in the game

customer_reviews.title: Super Addictive
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give Dragon Age a shot after I saw how cheap it was since it's been out for several years. Never been really into anything in the fantasy realm outside of Lord of the Rings. I also had a co-worker that raved about it too and I trust his opinion on games. I was definitely pleasantly surprised and found myself hooked. I know nothing about the backstory or really much about the game. However, I put in a lot of time into the game and never found myself bored at any point.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro H

customer_reviews.title: Good graphics, good for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this game. Her (age11) and other friends is 5th grade play it. Solo playing and levels. (Does have-bad language in it) but not more that what you here out of other gamers/videos).
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Dean

customer_reviews.title: This is a great game for the diehard gamer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for the diehard gamer. It is loaded with material and you can easily play for over 100 hours on it. This is one of my digs on it however in that it gets so long that it almost seems repetitive. The characters are fun and almost lifelike and the storyline is fun to track. With the endless open world you really can get about as much as you want out of the game. It is gory and dark and a little scary at times with extreme violence hence the M rating so I do not suggest the game for kids that are less than 13 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Mechanically excellent for an RPG
customer_reviews.text: Visually excellant. Mechanically excellent for an RPG. Length excellant, 80-70 hours for full playthrough. the player character can be modified for different sex, race, class, or appearance. Specialties are available at level 10, but only one and no subclasses i.e. DAO. Weapon and armor crafting is easy to understand yet challenging to master. NPC's have depth and their interactions are frequently humorous or add to the depth of the world around you. The overall storyline lacks narrative and isnt really satisfying. Certain factions are left in the cold regardless of your decisions and mutual success i.e. ME3 doesnt exist.
customer_reviews.author: ThunderGun

customer_reviews.title: this game has given me SO MANY HOURS of fun. I love the maps
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care what anyone says about Bioware and Dragon Age, this game has given me SO MANY HOURS of fun. I love the maps, I love the characters, I love everything. The only thing I wish was different was the leveling becuase I SUCK at video games. Other than that, yeah, it’s a great game and it’s got a lot of charm and I wish there were more like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess V.

customer_reviews.title: GOTY
customer_reviews.text: Easily my choice for Game of the Year. If you are still on the fence about purchasing this game I would definitely recommend it. I will list some of my pros and cons but if you want a more in depth review I suggest checking out IGN or Metacritic. Pros: Vast open worlds, great story telling, good character customization, fun game play, Cons: Not enough armor selection, not the greatest hair selection, companions could be a little more interesting
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Hours of pure adventure. Recommended for people who are tired of playing the same type of games.
customer_reviews.text: Graphics could be improved but the game is solid. I have been playing first person shooters only for too long, it was about time I played another category. This is full of hours of adventure. If you love game story plots, this is for you. You can read and talk to people for hours. There are enough quests to play every night. I normally don't have time to play for too long but, I already have 11 hours in this game. I would recommend this game for people who are tired of the same type of games.
customer_reviews.author: Joseann J. Robles

customer_reviews.title: The seller did great, the game sucks
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described and is new and showed up within two days as an amazon prime item. The game play itself sucks, there is no way to view the game as a first person player only as a third person player and targeting a creature is at random all you need to do to attack a creature is put a rubberband on the controller and walk away and the game will take care of its self. Poor rip off of Last Chaos!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Cool game
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool RP game where you create a main character, and as you progress you build up a team. It's kind of like skyrim, but without the freedom to go wherever you choose at any point. Really in depth character customization, and interesting characters.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Aliaga

customer_reviews.title: A Must For RPG fans that love side quests and building bonds between characters
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game with hours and hours of quests and missions. Love the characters, each has their own unique personalities that really flourish and shine, lots of decision making and the returning characters are lovely. The new ones are great. A beautiful game through and through. Love the music, the story and the bonds between your crew, the visuals, the challenge, the fighting system and weapons. A fantastic game!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi M

customer_reviews.title: MMO/World of Warcraft-esque Gameplay and Boring Story
customer_reviews.text: If you want some good critical reviews for what's wrong with this game, look at metacritic and type in "Warcraft" into the search page function. Boring story, boring dialogue, and boring characters with too many filler quests. I gave it 2 stars because of graphics (lovely) and game mechanics (pretty okay). Also, Dragon Keep does not seem to make that much of a difference. Import or don't import. It doesn't really matter. I am a Bioware fan too. Big disappointment for me. Maybe people already invested in the Dragon Age series will get more out of Inquisition.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: Not My Type of Game
customer_reviews.text: I suspect maybe I am not the target audience of this game. I built a rogue with dodge and parry and tried to treat this as an action rpg. It kinda worked for a little bit, but I can't get through the game like this. It's become stale and boring, presumably because I haven't cranked up the difficulty and used tactical mode. My trouble is that doing so yields a game where it can take a while to come up with a good plan of attack, and I don't want to spend several minutes per encounter. It did have some great story moments though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hassler

customer_reviews.title: BEST RPG OF 2014 & Return to Bioware's Glory!
customer_reviews.text: Dragon Age: Inquisition is probably the best game that was released in 2014. There are some moments where things feel repetitive and boring, but luckily you can choose how much of these things you want to do for the majority of the game. It's probably the all around best RPG experience that has been delivered by BioWare since Mass Effect 2. You will not leave this game disappointed if you're a fan of Bioware's work.
customer_reviews.author: Hahke

customer_reviews.title: Everything went well.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived safe, item as purchased, no product damage, and functioned properly. Happy days!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Tyler Sowards

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME
customer_reviews.text: This game was definitely worth the money. I bought it for my boyfriend and he played it until he beat it and still plays it to this day. He loves it. It arrived fast and safely packaged. A+ !!!! I definitely recommend this game for other gamers.
customer_reviews.author: lah3x

customer_reviews.title: To each their own
customer_reviews.text: The game delievery was terrific. The delivery of its graphic content, quite in-depth; yet play-worthy, I stopped midway. The story seems daunting in the side quests and once figuring in the Inquistion war table bonus points from your missons, its a bore. The points allow one slotted sentiment, and from only one of the six categories. Have a hay day, by the barns...in the game.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing, Plays Sharply, But I still feel left out of the story.
customer_reviews.text: I will preface this review with the fact that it was the first of the Dragon Age series I have played. I came in excited, I love a lot of Bioware's older games, and from what I saw of this game I was really excited to play it. However hours in, I still didn't find myself drawn to the game and ended up shelving it within a week. Odds are I'm missing out on some important plot points, and I would probably enjoy it more if I had played the prior releases beforehand. I think I will probably come back to this later on to see if I can get into it more.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing to Skyrim
customer_reviews.text: I recently completed this game and even did about 90% of the side missions. It's not quite as big as Skyrim, but very similar in a lot of ways. It's also a little buggy, but not that bad compared to a great many other games. The multiplayer option is kind of fun if you can find decent people to play with. If you like a good RPG with plenty of options, this is one to check out. It uses an open world model and offers a vast realm to explore.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Hey.. Atleast its cheap
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt look like a new gen game but the story is great, well? From what i can understand. You may need to know what happens in the previous game to enjoy fully. Love the tactical feel of the game but it kinda feels like those online rpg games. You dont really button mash in this game maybe just pressing RT but still a fun game for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Goosebumps

customer_reviews.title: Game of the Year
customer_reviews.text: Single player - 150+hours in and I haven't completed it. Mainly because... Multiplayer - I never thought it would be this addictive. Many people it was just added on because EA is a money leech. 12 characters to play. 3 warrior/rogue/mage. Get new weapons and armor. Fill out skill trees. I played each one through before looking online for guides on them. I'm currently using these builds and they are rocking it.
customer_reviews.author: Erich A. Mabray

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and entertaining game
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and entertaining game. Story: Immensely delivers, what you could ask for and more. Tons of content. Graphics: Gorgeous, delivers on all fronts, variety, climates, terrain... it has everything. 1080 30fps Gameplay: loads of fun, spells, choices, combos, abilities. Items: proportional to your level with your abilities. Great! Cons : wish there was more variety, in Coop though. Still fun as hell!
customer_reviews.author: Second Options

customer_reviews.title: As an RPG Gamer
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Dragon Age game. I love RPGs and this definitely was what I wanted. Xbox One doesn't have a lot of RPGs out yet that are really worth the time, so I was relieved when I started this one. If you're not used to the multi-character combat gameplay, it might take a while to get the hang of it. But in all honesty, if you like a game with an actual in depth story, beautiful graphics, and amazing replay-ability ... you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Slight Learning Curve but Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great game! It takes a while to learn the controls and try to understand the story if you haven't played the first two games but after four hours of gameplay or so it picks up and gets really fun.
customer_reviews.author: sarah2012

customer_reviews.title: awesome game. today is 5/26 and it is the ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome game. today is 5/26 and it is the best game to date for the next gen. I played this game fro a solid month. Lots to do and explore. The price is cheap so get it already. If you like any rpg of this style you need to try it. Much improved over the previous games in gameplay. Maybe not so much in storyline.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great game.  Amazon dropped the ball on shipping.
customer_reviews.text: If you love RPG's you will enjoy Inquisition. Lots of depth in the game play and tons of content. Unfortunately 2 day guarantee is not that. Called Amazon and asked why "guarantee" turned into 4 days. Then customer service rep tried to explain how shipping works. I gave up without satisfaction on the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Hayes

customer_reviews.title: ok game
customer_reviews.text: I hope they change next release with more control over builds.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: The seller I brought this game from was the best. All I can say about DA:I is that everyone who is a fan of the RPG genre should at least try this game and see how they like it. I personally put in about 400+ hours in to this game over several play throughs.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: This game is great and long too
customer_reviews.text: This game is great and long too. You will play for hours and hours and hours on end and love it. This is an awesome rpg that's all about a great story and growing your character. You get to create your character and your choices will effect the story.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Had alot of fun playing this story...XB1
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed playing this game. Great story and if you like games like The Witcher, Skyrim, Oblivion, Elders Scoll, you'll love this game. Xbox One
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: An Absolute Blast
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn't say I'm surprised that this is so good. It's characters are the normally amazing Bioware stardard, but with a few extra special gems. The game is simply massive in scope. The combat can be both thrilling and very tactical at the same time. Visually, the game is stunning and I no matter how much I explored, there was always more to do but it never really got redundant. There were a few bugs that were a little annoying when it came to interacting with certain npcs but they were hardly game breaking and a simple save/load cycle cleared it up every time.
customer_reviews.author: hrock

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game! I am a big fan of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game! I am a big fan of the dragon age games and I absolutely loved this game from beginning to end.
customer_reviews.author: Meleia91

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the amount of game you get
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who likes RPGs but has a hard time getting into some of them. The fact that he spends endless hours playing it most days (although I only see him gathering plants on it) suggests to me that he really likes it and is really into it. I do not like RPGs, so I have not played it but it looks good (minus the fact that he made a really ugly troll-like character, and it is a good value for the game time you get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allchin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I think this was an amazing strategy game. Very time consuming but rewarding. Played the game 2 or 3 times before I got bored. If you enjoy a strategy style game, try this out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Works great! And this version looks so much better on the Xbox One than the Xbox 360
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game! Lots of customization of skills
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game! Lots of customization of skills, attacks and gear. Great RPG for the Xbox, hooked me like Skyrim did for the old Xbox 360! Definitely worth playing.
customer_reviews.author: B.N.

customer_reviews.title: My 10 yo son plays this for over an hour ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yo son plays this for over an hour everytime he puts it on. He enjoys the adventures and how one can change characters as well as choose the direction that they want the game to go.
customer_reviews.author: jrod

customer_reviews.title: I've gotten about 18 hours in and its pretty fun, having not played any of the previous ...
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten about 18 hours in and its pretty fun, having not played any of the previous titles I'm still a little behind on whats happened but it doesn't seem to be a big problem as the storyline in this game is pretty easy to follow with.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Good Addition the the Dragon Age Saga
customer_reviews.text: Though I do think that I liked Skyrim slightly better, I have really enjoyed this game and I think it is a huge step forward after the crappy repetitiveness of DA2. Also, I don't know why people are complaining about the quality of the graphics, unless they meant to review the game under the XBox 360. My game appears to have great quality in the graphics, even better than Skyrim did most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Dragon age is amazing. Pretty good story and lot interesting theories to maybe future games! I hope they create another one! Really enjoy the games!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Hundreds of hours of game play.  Almost embarrassing to admit.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this game. I have played through so many times and now that it's been 7 months since I am ready for another play though with the new add on's. Yeah its that cool :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sedlacek

customer_reviews.title: I remember watching gameplay trailers, and my expectations were ...
customer_reviews.text: I remember watching gameplay trailers, and my expectations were high. Some of the features were scrapped, and while still a solid game, I wish what they showed in early development made it to the final product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cherwinski

customer_reviews.title: Bad case
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get a actual case, just some piece of junk no title black case
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Great game and really is worth a look if you like RPG's. Don't go in expecting Skyrim that would just be an absurd thing to compare it too/
customer_reviews.author: John Phillips III

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for more
customer_reviews.text: Game is awesome. Some side quest are really dull and time consuming. The character customization is limited for a next gen game.Not much variety to it or the games armor availability. But game is still fun
customer_reviews.author: Stevo87

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Game
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Game. Starts slow, but I blame myself more about getting sidetracked. Fully immersive gameplay, haven't played in the keep yet, but seriously, read the lore as you progress. It's captivating. Only downside I've had is game restarting randomly only done it...I'd say 5 times in 2months, and slow leveling even trying to farm Xperia
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: The game is strides better than 2 but not as focused as the first
customer_reviews.text: :) It almost feels too big and empty at times and many of the side quests feel pointless. The game is strides better than 2 but not as focused as the first. Its still very enjoyable and very fun ride. :)
customer_reviews.author: Snappy

customer_reviews.title: Best console game in the past year!
customer_reviews.text: Best Game console I bought in the year, period. Great RPG experience with many skill tree options, crafting and customizable gear, choice driven story line, mostly well developed characters, and interesting subplots. I've put over 120 hours in my first play through and already started a second play through.
customer_reviews.author: trumpet-king

customer_reviews.title: Seems like there is lots to do though
customer_reviews.text: Feels a bit more linear than the first. I tried making two characters and they seem to have the same opening stories. Seems like there is lots to do though.
customer_reviews.author: Holic

customer_reviews.title: A return to form, and a great RPG
customer_reviews.text: a great return to form for dragon age. It's world is expansive and even the grindy parts dont feel grindy, they are fun. If you liked the first one you will love this robust universe
customer_reviews.author: J. Thorburn

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, came as expected in good shape. Box wasn't damaged at all and on time. Good game and I got at a great price at the time. I would say this is one of the Xbox one must haves.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: "It's awesome", says my boyfriend. I haven't seen ...
customer_reviews.text: "It's awesome", says my boyfriend. I haven't seen him since he opened this game. So... If you're looking to distract your other half (or get them out of your hair), this is the game for you!
customer_reviews.author: ThatOneChick

customer_reviews.title: I know I will spend hours wasted on this game
customer_reviews.text: I know I will spend hours wasted on this game. Beautiful to look at, I don't feel like I'm being rushed by the story line so I'm trying to do every little side mission. Great free roaming. Can't wait to get my character laid...
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement over DA2
customer_reviews.text: A good blend of DA:O and DA2, this game is leaps and bounds better than DA2 was. World is huge, gameplay is fun, definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bohannon

customer_reviews.title: Difficult gameplay
customer_reviews.text: This game has a different style of gameplay. It was extremely difficult to adapt to at first and the game only gave you one tutorial on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke English

customer_reviews.title: Solid RPG for XBox One
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 8 hours into this game so far, and enjoying it pretty well. Game is a little buggy at times, but nothing too severe. Lots of stuff to do, I can see myself spending a lot of time on this game.
customer_reviews.author: bt

customer_reviews.title: side quests aren't annoying, and you can choose to skip them if ...
customer_reviews.text: Stands up well on its own. Decent story, side quests aren't annoying, and you can choose to skip them if you want. I'm not a fan of the multiplayer for this game, but at least it isn't required to get the best ending like in mass effect 3. A little disappointed at some of the missing character class professions like arcane warrior, but I guess that class was a little overpowered. Overall a good game.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite games this year so far
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite games this year so far. Takes a little getting use to the combat style, but really fun once you get the hang of it. I'd give it a 9.5 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McClellan

customer_reviews.title: This is the best game! It is so much fun
customer_reviews.text: This is the best game! It is so much fun. It has a great story line, lots of fun battles, and tons of side quests. As soon as I finished it, I wanted to start over and play again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the greatest games I have played in a long time. There is so many different elements to it, so many styles of game play. I've already logged in over 70 hours and there is no end in sight. In fact it seems I am still in the early stages of the game. I would recommend this to any hardcore gamer who likes games of this genre.
customer_reviews.author: John Houck

customer_reviews.title: Great worldbuilding by Bioware
customer_reviews.text: Great worldbuilding by Bioware, but not enough innovation. I felt as though someone had slapped the elements of Bioware games onto Skyrim and called it good.
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: BioWare has created a great game. It has a scale that is enormous, with multiple, free-roaming maps, and pretty environments. It has well crafted party members that each have their own personalities and stories to explore. It's main storyline is well told, and that’s easy to grasp for more casual players, but it has lot's of added depth for those willing to explore the world.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Starr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the Dragon Age games and this one is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: David Vanbogelen

customer_reviews.title: Game of the year 2014
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the game of the year in 2014 it is very fun not too short not too long. I would indefinitely play this game again.
customer_reviews.author: casey schott

customer_reviews.title: I'll be playing this game for awhile
customer_reviews.text: I'll let you know what my follow up review is when I finish playing this amazing game in 10 years
customer_reviews.author: Zach Brown

customer_reviews.title: Role playing games are fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent story and fun characters, with fantastic environments in which to explore. I thoroughly enjoy this game very, very much.
customer_reviews.author: David SM

customer_reviews.title: Game of the year
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't blown away at 1st but the game just keeps getting better and better every single day you play.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Hierholzer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This game had way more to it than I expected! I would describe it as skyrim/fable/runescape style. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty slow paced game so far. Clearly designed for pc. doesn't beat the first one in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Pozar

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: This is easily one of my top games ever. Amazing characters and world building and a really impressive amount of impactful choices. No need to play the first two games, but you'll appreciate the references if you did. I also love how the world is huge, but every corner looks intentionally designed. It's a truly beautiful game
customer_reviews.author: Wolfman9093

customer_reviews.title: Great game takes long time to complete the game too
customer_reviews.text: Great game takes long time to complete the game too, normally I can finish a game in under 20 hours but this one has me going for 90 hours and Im still not finished.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: It's not perfect, but Dragon Age
customer_reviews.text: It's not perfect, but Dragon Age: Inquisition is, in my opinion, the best game in the series so far. Also, you fight dragons.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Truly Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The game so far is fantastic, the voice acting is great, the visuals are astonishing, and the gameplay is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Sweet.
customer_reviews.text: Super good game. Takes a hot minute to get into, but holy moly. If you're on the fence about this, don't be. It's worth picking up.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Modelle

customer_reviews.title: Happy with what I got
customer_reviews.text: Game is awesome. I thought it was a very easy process to get it. Game was exactly as described and came very quickly
customer_reviews.author: John Wickham

customer_reviews.title: Combat system kills it
customer_reviews.text: Great game -except for the combat. If you like Diablo 3 style of combat system then I'm sure it's not a problem... But I think it's uninspired and I had to trade the game in because of that. Too bad, I would've loved to see how the story unfolded
customer_reviews.author: MisterKennyM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: DIS IS FAVORITE GAME MAYBE EVER. just a terrific game. cheers!
customer_reviews.author: D.H.A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games I've ever played. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Biggest bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Great game if you are a fan of Bioware. There is just so much to do.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Casas

customer_reviews.title: Fun game easy game. Holds attention.
customer_reviews.text: Ive never been one to finish campaigns. I normally lose focus and move on to the next game. But I found this game really grabbed my attention. There is a lot of customization. All around just a fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed the game
customer_reviews.text: The game starts slow but had plenty of side and main quests. The story and gameplay is very solid. Enjoyed the game.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything in the game is awesome except the fighting, its just not smooth
customer_reviews.author: robot looee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the game and would recommend it to anyone who is new to rpg
customer_reviews.author: Jackson J.

customer_reviews.title: Great game, a few bugs
customer_reviews.text: Great game, a few bugs, but overall amazing. Huge amounts of content to explore, various classes, and choices to be made. I wish they had given the story a few more polarizing decisions to allow for man more replays, but I still loved going through a few times with different classes.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the most expansive and great games I have ever played for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: William Logan Garber

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining game. It has a vast world to explore. It gets better once you have better weapons & powers.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Gundaker

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Game! Tons of content! Even the "mini-quests" are well done and acted.......loads of fun.....
customer_reviews.author: Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Late comer but enjoying it already.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I just got this game, I like the graphics and the story seems to be going on well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mfawa Alfred Onen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game, plays it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Thommie152

customer_reviews.title: It is actually fun to watch her play it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this game. It is actually fun to watch her play it, that does not happen a lot at my age. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son wanted it for Christmas and this was the best price I found
customer_reviews.author: Craig Gardella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: get ready to lose 100+ hrs out of your life if you want to complete the whole game
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game. Huge world, tons to do. Easy to spend hours upon hours without realizing it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game. Blew me away. And it's so cheap right now. Glad I got this! 9.5/10.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty hard to follow if your not into role playing ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest game in the world. Pretty hard to follow if your not into role playing games.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D. Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and deep!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome game!! The dept of the game is off the charts!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for one of my sons... hasn't complained yet!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Must be a good game, my son hasn't come out of his ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Received on a Sunday! Must be a good game, my son hasn't come out of his room since he got it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Finn

customer_reviews.title: Best RPG for Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Game is amazing. Still haven't beat single player because it has so much to do. Online is pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game!!! I was looking for a game to cure my RPG itch, and Dragon Age did that and them some.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Richard Wade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The package came way earlier than expected!!! Product received as described.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Segawa

product_meta.title: Dragon Age Inquisition - Standard Edition - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:StandardDark times have come to Thedas - monstrous dragons cast ominous shadows from above while chaos erupts all around you. What was once a land of peace and happiness is now ripped apart by conflict as the Mages wage bloody battle against their oppressors, the Templars. Someone must restore order to Thedas and put an end to those who seek to destroy the land. It's time to lead the Inquisition - a band of legendary heroes and the only hope of Thedas - and wage a war to end this reign of terror.
feature_bullets: Become the Inquisitor: Wield the power of the Inquisition over the course of an epic character-driven story, and lead a perilous journey of discovery through the Dragon Age
Bond with Legends: A cast of unique, memorable characters will develop dynamic relationships both with you and with each other
Discover the Dragon Age: Freely explore a diverse, visually stunning, and immersive living world
Change the WorldYour actions and choices will shape a multitude of story outcomes along with the tangible, physical aspects of the world itself

Play Your WayCompletely control the appearance and abilities of your Inquisitor, party of followers, outposts, and strongholds. Decide the makeup of your Inquisition forces and your own style of combat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars569 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
